steps.title: For a more interesting reaction, send a funny meme or reaction gif.
steps.content: For a more interesting reaction, send a funny meme or reaction gif. Emojis are a kind of shorthand, so switching to a different shorthand is totally fine. Just tailor your response depending on if they were joking, flirting, or being platonically sweet. For example, send a meme about a girl freaking out that they just got kissed, or send a reaction gif of someone winking flirtatiously. These are great since you can find very specific responses based on your conversation. [10] X Research source Most phones have a built-in gif library you can scroll through to find something relevant.
